00023 #ifndef _MCCOM_H_
00024 #define _MCCOM_H_

00030 #ifndef E_PROP_SET_UNSUPPORTED

00032 #endif //E_PROP_SET_UNSUPPORTED

00037 #ifndef CI_DEFINE_GUID
00038 
00039 #ifdef __GNUG__  /* gcc/g++ compiler (Linux, Symbian ARMI) does the equivalent of _declspec(selectany) */
00040 #define ATTRIBUTE_WEAK     __attribute__ ((weak))
00041 #ifndef DECLSPEC_SELECTANY
00042 #define DECLSPEC_SELECTANY
00043 #endif
00044 #elif defined(__ADS__)
00045 #define ATTRIBUTE_WEAK  
00046 #define DECLSPEC_SELECTANY 
00047 #else
00048 #define ATTRIBUTE_WEAK
00049 #if !defined(DECLSPEC_SELECTANY)
00050 #define DECLSPEC_SELECTANY _declspec(selectany)
00051 #endif
00052 #endif
00053 
00054         #define CI_DEFINE_GUID(name, l, w1, w2, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5, b6, b7, b8) \
00055                  EXTERN_C DECLSPEC_SELECTANY const GUID FAR name ATTRIBUTE_WEAK \
00056                 = { l, w1, w2, { b1, b2,  b3,  b4,  b5,  b6,  b7,  b8 } }
00057                 
00058 #endif //CI_DEFINE_GUID
00059 
00060 /* the following is used for COM delegation.  It is not
00061 directly called because it does not support delegation/
00062 aggregation. */
00063 
00064 DECLARE_INTERFACE(IMcNonDelegatingUnknown)
00065 {
00066         STDMETHOD(NonDelegatingQueryInterface)(THIS_ REFIID, LPVOID *) PURE;
00067         STDMETHOD_(ULONG, NonDelegatingAddRef)(THIS) PURE;
00068         STDMETHOD_(ULONG, NonDelegatingRelease)(THIS) PURE;
00069 };
00070 
00071 /*
00072 DECLARE_IUNKNOWN is required for the derived class exporting
00073 COM functionality.  This ensures that the outermost class
00074 which is aggregating the object gets the proper QueryInterface
00075 request. */
00076 
00077 #ifdef DECLARE_IUNKNOWN
00078 #undef DECLARE_IUNKNOWN
00079 #endif
00080 #define DECLARE_IUNKNOWN \
00081     STDMETHODIMP QueryInterface(REFIID riid, void **ppv) { \
00082         return GetOwner()->QueryInterface(riid,ppv); \
00083     }; \
00084     STDMETHODIMP_(ULONG) AddRef() { \
00085         return GetOwner()->AddRef(); \
00086     }; \
00087     STDMETHODIMP_(ULONG) Release() { \
00088         return GetOwner()->Release(); \
00089     };
00090 
00091 class CMcUnknown : IMcNonDelegatingUnknown
00092 {
00093 public:
00094         CMcUnknown(LPCTSTR pName = 0, LPUNKNOWN pUnk = 0)
00095         {
00096                 m_lRef = 1;
00097                 m_pName = pName;
00098             m_pUnk = pUnk ? pUnk : reinterpret_cast<IUnknown*>(static_cast<IMcNonDelegatingUnknown *>(this));
00099         }
00100         virtual ~CMcUnknown() 
00101         {
00102                 m_pName = NULL;
00103                 m_pUnk = NULL;
00104         }
00105         STDMETHODIMP_(ULONG) NonDelegatingAddRef() 
00106         {
00107                 return InterlockedIncrement(&m_lRef);
00108         }
00109         STDMETHODIMP NonDelegatingQueryInterface(REFIID riid, LPVOID *ppvObj)
00110         {
00111                 if(ppvObj==0)
00112                         return E_POINTER;
00113                 if(riid==IID_IUnknown)
00114                         return GetInterface(reinterpret_cast<IUnknown*>(static_cast<IMcNonDelegatingUnknown*>(this)), ppvObj);
00115                 return E_NOINTERFACE;
00116         }
00117         STDMETHODIMP_(ULONG) NonDelegatingRelease()
00118         {
00119                 LONG ref;
00120                 
00121                 ref = InterlockedDecrement(&m_lRef);
00122                 if(ref<=0)
00123                         delete this;
00124                 return ref;
00125         }
00126         LPUNKNOWN GetOwner()
00127         {
00128                 return m_pUnk;
00129         }
00130         STDMETHOD (GetInterface)(LPUNKNOWN pUnk, LPVOID *ppvObj)
00131         {
00132                 if(ppvObj==0)
00133                         return E_POINTER;
00134                 NonDelegatingAddRef();
00135                 *ppvObj = pUnk;
00136                 return S_OK;
00137         }
00138 protected:
00139         LPCTSTR m_pName;
00140         LONG m_lRef;
00141         LPUNKNOWN m_pUnk;
00142 };
00143 
00144 template <typename T> inline HRESULT GetCom(T tValue, LPVOID pPropData, DWORD cbPropData, DWORD *pcbReturned)
00145 {
00146         if(pPropData==0)
00147                 return E_POINTER;
00148         if(cbPropData<sizeof(T))
00149                 return E_INVALIDARG;
00150         *reinterpret_cast<T *>(pPropData) = tValue;
00151         if(pcbReturned)
00152                 *pcbReturned = sizeof(T);
00153         return S_OK;
00154 }
00155 
00156 template <typename T> inline HRESULT SetCom(T &tValue, LPVOID pPropData, DWORD cbPropData)
00157 {
00158         if(pPropData==0)
00159                 return E_POINTER;
00160         if(sizeof(T)<cbPropData)
00161                 return E_INVALIDARG;
00162         tValue = *reinterpret_cast<T *>(pPropData);
00163         return S_OK;
00164 }
00165 
00166 template <typename T> inline HRESULT GetComString(T *tValue, LPVOID pPropData, DWORD cbPropData, DWORD *pcbReturned)
00167 {
00168         unsigned i;
00169         T *dst;
00170 
00171         if(pPropData==0)
00172                 return E_POINTER;
00173         for(i=0,dst=reinterpret_cast<T *>(pPropData);*tValue && i<=cbPropData-sizeof(T);i+=sizeof(T))
00174                 *dst++ = *tValue++;     // copy data
00175         *dst++ = 0;     // ensure zero terminated
00176         if(pcbReturned)
00177                 *pcbReturned = i+sizeof(T);
00178         return *tValue ? E_FAIL : S_OK;
00179 }
00180 
00181 template <typename T> inline HRESULT SetComString(T *tValue, DWORD cbValue, LPVOID pPropData, DWORD cbPropData)
00182 {
00183         unsigned i;
00184         T *src;
00185 
00186         if(pPropData==0)
00187                 return E_POINTER;
00188         if(cbPropData>cbValue)
00189                 return E_INVALIDARG;
00190         for(i=0,src=reinterpret_cast<T *>(pPropData);*src && i<=cbValue-sizeof(T);i+=sizeof(T))
00191                 *tValue++ = *src++;     // copy data
00192         *tValue++ = 0;  // ensure zero terminated
00193         return *src ? E_FAIL : S_OK;
00194 }
00195 
00196 inline HRESULT ReturnComLong(LONG lValue, LPVOID pPropData, DWORD cbPropData, DWORD *pcbReturned)
00197 {
00198         if(pPropData==0)
00199                 return E_POINTER;
00200         if(cbPropData<sizeof(LONG))
00201                 return E_INVALIDARG;
00202         *reinterpret_cast<LONG *>(pPropData) = lValue;
00203         if(pcbReturned)
00204                 *pcbReturned = sizeof(LONG);
00205         return S_OK;
00206 }

00208 #endif //_MCCOM_H_
